text: The recursive publishing has to be enabled in the default pub.
creator: t.hartwig@crapoud.com

text:
andreas,

is it robust enough yet?
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
There are some problems re. languages. The unicms publication uses recursive
publishing, maybe it makes sense to look at its bugzilla.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
andreas,

i saw your checkin. can this be closed?
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
No, it is not yet carefully tested. And I'd like to add recursive deactivation
too before the bug can be closed.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: It is implemented, please REOPEN if problems occur.
creator: andreas@apache.org
